Build the internal structures from the searchMap and WriteableSearchMapStringTable.

Should only be used by SearchUnit when building the struct.

Member Function Documentation

void WriteableMultiStringSearch::addMSSTempData (  MSSTempDataMap &  dataMap,
char *  str,
const MSSTempData &  data
)  [inline, private]
 

Adds a temporary data structure to the internal storage.

Checks if there already is one and or:s the stringparts together if there is. The string is owned by the WriteableMultiStringSearch after this so it must be a copy.
